tool_description: Real-time ESG news API that tracks thousands of news sources, social media, and NGOs to provide up-to-date information on Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) topics.

api_list.name: getESGNews
api_list.description: Fetches ESG news using a state-of-the-art algorithm that monitors various sources in real-time, covering topics such as SASB, UN SDGs, Modern Slavery, and Gender Equality.

optional_parameters.name: Content-Type
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date for the news articles in DD/MM/YYYY format.

optional_parameters.name: companyname
optional_parameters.description: Name of the company for which ESG news is being requested.

optional_parameters.name: isin
optional_parameters.description: International Securities Identification Number for the company.
